title: 28-year-old beauty Melissa Sousa missing, found dead, rolled in a tarp
itunes:title: 28-year-old beauty Melissa Sousa missing, found dead, rolled in a tarp
description:
A beautiful, young mother of twins goes missing and is later found in rolled up in a tarp in the basement of her own home. What happened to Melissa Sousa?

Joining Nancy to discuss the case:

Ashley Willcott - Judge and trial attorney, www.ashleywillcott.com

Steven Lampley - Former Detective, Author "Outside Your Door"

Dr Bethany Marshall - Psychoanalyst 

Dr Michelle Dupree - Medical Examiner & Author of “Homicide Investigation Field Guide"

Alexis Terezchuck - Investigative Reporter, Radaronline.com  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
